messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: How to deal with the negativity that comes from being with relat
messages.msgSnippet: -=-As you can see I am still learning to reframe these things as a choice...but it helps every time I do.-=- You re putting a step between yourself and the
messages.messageBody:
-=-As you can see I am still learning to reframe these things as a choice...but it helps every time I do.-=-

You're putting a step between yourself and the direct choicemaking.

If every time you think or speak or act you make a choice, then you never will need to reframe anything. Take the frames off. :-) Just make choices.

http://sandradodd.com/mindfulparenting

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: How to deal with the negativity that comes from being with relat
messages.msgSnippet: ***Reminding myself that if I can keep the space light, peaceful and joyful, we ll all feel better. I m the most skilled person in my family who can do this. I
messages.messageBody:
***Reminding myself that if I can keep the space light, peaceful and joyful, we'll all feel better. I'm the most skilled person in my family who can do this. I feel it is my responsibility***


Ah...it's that reframing it as a choice thing...I can do that here too and it will help. Thank you!

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: How to deal with the negativity that comes from being with relat
messages.msgSnippet: *****Reminding myself that if I can keep the space light, peaceful and joyful, we ll all feel better. I m the most skilled person in my family who can do this.
messages.messageBody:
*****Reminding myself that if I can keep the space light, peaceful and joyful, we'll all feel better. I'm the most skilled person in my family who can do this. I feel it is my responsibility*****

This is beautiful and I'll try and keep it in mind. Seeing it as something I can do rather than as me always biting my tongue.

As you can see I am still learning to reframe these things as a choice...but it helps every time I do.
